name: .MRG File Extension
summary: Learn about .MRG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Merge template created by Now Contact, an application that organizes contact information and day-to-day activities; contains a print layout template for your letter document; pre-loaded options include "Fancy Letter," "Flower Letter," "Swoosh Letter," and "Ship Letter."

content: To create the MRG file, select Define → Print Templates → Faxes..., select the "+" button in the top-right, name the template, and click OK. You will then be able to edit the template layout and its dimensions. Click OK when you're finished.
When creating a new .NWP letter document, you can select a MRG template to work off of by choosing a template from the "Use Template" drop down menu.
To select the template you want to print from, select File → Print Templates..., choose your template from the "Template Type" drop down menu, and click OK.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
